title: Ling Tosite Sigure Discography 2008
description:
Ling Tosite Sigure - Discography (2008)


!SEED YOUR PORTION! And it won't kill you to comment and grade.
                           
   ____________________________________________________________________


   Artist   : Ling Tosite Sigure
   Home     : http://sigure.jp/
  
   Genre   : JRock/Indie rock/Hardcore
   Size    : 265 mb

   Encoding: mp3
   Quality : 160 - 320 kbps	VBR  : 44.1kHz

   ____________________________________________________________________

   DESCRIPTION:

   Ling Tosite Sigure, also known as Rin Toshite Shigure, are a
   three-piece JRock band. The band was formed in Saitama, Japan in 2000.
   
   Their sound is fast guitar driven music with many abrupt tempo changes.
   The band is noted for their high energy live shows and the dual, often screaming, vocals of the male guitarist (TK) and female bass player (345). 
         
   ____________________________________________________________________

   ALBUM LIST:
   
   2005 - #4
   2006 - Feeling Your UFO
   2007 - Inspiration is DEAD
   2008 - Telecastic Fake Show
   
   
   Also includes:
   - Complete Japanese, English and kanji tags.
   - Some Cover Art
   - .flv and .mp4 videos of the singles Sadistic Summer, Disco Flight and Telecastic Fake Show.

   ____________________________________________________________________
